title: 7.2 Master Challenge 2
question: The country codes and names of the countries are given in the following image in columns A and B. The names of some people along with their country codes are mentioned in columns D and E. Use VLOOKUP to find the country with reference to the country code.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
